1370: Jonghen moved to De Tuyt.C.2 after marriage.
Got married to Ghela at age 22 in 1370.
1371: Had a daughter with Ghela, Moerseil, at age 23.
1372: Had a daughter with Ghela, Amelgeir, at age 24.
1374: Lost daughter Moerseil when Moerseil was 4 years old.
1375: Had a son with Ghela, Mourin, at age 27.
1376: Had a son with Ghela, Dilane, at age 28.
1378: Had a daughter with Ghela, Emgelberna, at age 30.
1381: Had a daughter with Ghela, Siwa, at age 33.
1384: Had a daughter with Ghela, Woltwigis, at age 36.
1385: Had a son with Ghela, Lubertus, at age 37.
1387: Lost son Mourin when Mourin was 13 years old.
1389: Had a son with Ghela, Guido, at age 41.
1393: Lost daughter Amelgeir when Amelgeir was 21 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
Lost daughter Siwa when Siwa was 13 years old.
1395: Lost daughter Emgelberna when Emgelberna was 18 years old.
